Description:
----------------
In Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet, players can "Hero Up" with friends in cooperative play I love The only power factor of each of the heroes of Marvel in three game modes: Story Mode, Game Mode Free and Challenge Mode. The game also features a brand new component puzzle in which players must use the unique abilities of the characters to move or destroy objects, go through certain environments, and call the specific strengths to overcome obstacles.
With new quests, tricky puzzles, an expanded selection of members of Marvel Super Hero Squad to unlock and play, Marvel Super Hero Squad: The Infinity Gauntlet is set to thrill players here at Super Hero City
